name: Megalit
overview: A wicked witch wants to rule the world with the power of her magic jewels. She has abducted all the princesses, elves, and fairies who have magic jewels from their castles and has cast a Megalit spell on them. One brave hero comes to the rescue but he also is cast under the wicked witch's spell and is turned into a statue of stone. In order to save the captured princesses and to break his own spell, the brave hero must solve Megalit's puzzle. Restore peace to the Kingdom by helping our hero solve the puzzle!
